special_text:
[+1]: Create an Omen token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[0]: Sacrifice an artifact. When you do, Hedgewick deals 3 damage to any target.
[-3]: Target player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
[-5]: Create three 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.” Those tokens 
gain haste.
